item.title: The Easy Way To Stand Out As An Early CS Student
item.author: Author
item.description: The concise, stress free guide start your journey to break into tech for 1st and 2nd year CS students.

item.title: The Invisible Curriculum: What Colleges Fail To Teach
item.author: Author
item.description: 1 out of 8 college grads are unemployed. ~40% of recent colleges are underemployed. Learn precisely what you need to know before committing 4 years and tens of thousands of dollars to today's antiquated academic institutions.

item.title: Why I'm Starting This Blog
item.author: Author
item.description: In a nutshell, I want to! That’s it. That’s the blog post. (jk)
